/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, indicating a sunny day. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the various elements in the image. In the distance, buildings rise, their architecture a testament to Beijing's blend of tradition and modernity. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye along the length of the street.
